I Don’t Want To Ask

‘Hardly anyone knew I was going back to college’

Click on the image of this student to find out a little bit more about their story.

Many people don’t tell others about their course, at least at the start.

However, research shows that those who tell someone about the course they are going to do are more likely to successfully complete it.

Consider telling, and asking, someone you trust about the decisions you are facing.

Go to My Support Network
